Note: For a short ME prose tract, ‘according to Seynt Gregore’, see Oxford, Bodleian Library Bodley 220 (SC 2103), f. 101.
_description: XII Gradus Humilitatis secundum Bernardum — seven couplets

NLS18721.First Lines:
Ber þe wel an quemfulicheSpek seldom &
                    skilfuliche…
NLS18721.Last Lines:
…ȝef þu wilth ben meke sothlicheffulfil þese
                    þinges bisiliche
NLS18721.Note:
‘Sit bona et placita tua conuersacio’ to the right at
                    the beginning.
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 17.
